wikipedia_page.main: Lee Mark Hildreth (born 22 November 1988) is an English footballer who plays for Southern League Premier Central side Barwell, where he plays as a midfielder.

response: On 20 February 2014, Baker-Richardson joined Conference side Tamworth on a youth loan. He made his debut on 22 February 2014, coming on in the 68th minute for Lee Hildreth in the 1–1 draw against Welling United.
